note.p: Education: University College, London; Royal College of Chemistry; St John's College, Cambridge. MA (Camb)
Career: Lecturer in Applied Mechanics, Cambridge; Professor of Electrical Engineering, University College, London (1885)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1945-1948 vol 5 pp 231-242, plate, by W H Eccles
References: Sir Brian Pippard, FRS, 'Schoolmaster-Fellows and the campaign for science education' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 63-81, plate
J T MacGregor-Morris, 'Sir Ambrose Fleming (Jubilee of the Valve)' in NR 1954-55 vol 11 pp 134-144, plate
